column1:
A@b@c@example.com
There can only be a single @ character

column2:
e:f;gi[j\k]l@example.com
Certain characters cannot be in the local-part unquoted

column1:
just"not"right@example.com
Quoted strings must be separated by dots

1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234+x@example.com
The local-part cannot have more than 64 characters

i_like_underscore@but_its_not_allowed_in_this_part.example.com
Underscores are not allowed in the domain

#@%^%#$@#$@#.com
There can only be a single @ character

.email@example.com
The local-part cannot begin with the . character

email.@example.com
The local-part cannot end with the . character

email..email@example.com
The local-part cannot contain two dots in a row

email@-example.com
The domain cannot start with the - character

email@111.222.333.44444
The top level domain cannot be all numeric

email@example..com
The domain cannot contain two dots in a row

this\ is"really"not\allowed@example.com
The backslash escape must escape a special character

column3: character is not allowed in the domain

column1:
email@[12.34.44.56
The domain literal must have the closing bracket

email@14.44.56.34]
The domain literal must have the opening bracket

email@[1.1.23.5f]
The IPv4 format must be valid (disallowed character)

email@[3.256.255.23]
The IPv4 format must be valid (256 is above the IP range)

firstlast"@test.org
The final quote is invalid (missing pair and not dot-separated)

first.last@[.12.34.56.78]
The IPv4 format must be valid (leading dot)

first.last@[12.34.56.789]
The IPv4 format must be valid (789 is above the IP range)

first.last@[::12.34.56.78]
IPv6 domain literal must have IPv6 tag

test@example.com
Invalid characters in the domain are not allowed

first.last@[IPv6:1111:2222:3333:4444:5555:6666:7777]
The IPv6 format must be valid (not enough segments)

first.last@[IPv6:1111:2222:3333:4444:5555:6666:7777:8888:9999]
The IPv6 format must be valid (too many segments)

first.last@[IPv6:1111:2222::3333::4444:5555:6666]
The IPv6 format must be valid (Only one set of :: is allowed)

first.last@[IPv6:1111:2222:333x::4444:5555]
The IPv6 format must be valid (x is not a valid hexadecimal character)

first.last@[IPv6:1111:2222:33333::4444:5555]
The IPv6 format must be valid (33333 is not a valid segment)

first.last@[IPv6::]
The IPv6 format must be valid (: is invalid)

first.last@[IPv6::::]
The IPv6 format must be valid (::: is invalid)

aaa@[123.123.123.123]a
A domain literal cannot have extra characters outside of the brackets
